alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oldham, northwestern Potter, southwestern Moore and southeastern Hartley Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Boys Ranch, or 23 miles southwest of Dumas, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Oldham, northwestern Potter, southwestern Moore and southeastern Hartley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
